section.title: Description
section.p: A healthcare-related procedure or service, to include medications and durable equipment, that is anticipated to be funded, in full or in part, by a given Healthcare Policy.

stentry.p: Identifies a healthcare-related procedure or service, to include medications and durable equipment, that is anticipated to be funded, in full or in part, by a given Healthcare Policy.

Represents the amount of money for which patient is responsible for the provision of a medical product, procedure, or service, expressed as a percentage of its cost. For example, if a plan pays 80% of the cost of non-formulary drugs, the patient is responsible for 20%, and this property would contain 0.20.

Represents the amount of money for which patient is responsible for the provision of a medical product, procedure, or service, expressed as a flat monetary amount. For example, if a plan pays all but $25 of the cost of on-formulary prescription drugs, the patient is responsible for the remaining $25. In this example, this property would contain $25.
